hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #treasure chest game# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Fingers-Mazda, the first thief in the world, stole fire from the gods.^But he was unable to fence it.&It was too hot.&He got really burned on that deal.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GV (Waterfall).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Heart Container#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #6# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found in #the Market#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Market Potion Shop#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #Double Defense#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Lakeside Laboratory#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Before Heavy Block Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.
